name: The line starts and ends with the same character
instruction:
Write a function `isSameStartAndEnd` that accepts a string and returns `true` if the string begins and ends with the same character.

Do not count spaces at the beginning and end of the string.

Not case sensitive.

Examples:
```javascript
isSameStartAndEnd('a'); // true
isSameStartAndEnd(' aa'); // true
isSameStartAndEnd('abA '); // true
isSameStartAndEnd('a b a '); // true
isSameStartAndEnd('a b b'); // false
isSameStartAndEnd('a b a b'); // false
```
